metadata.Title: CVE-2020-27067 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description: In the l2tp subsystem, there is a possible use after free due to a race condition. This could lead to local escalation of privilege with System execution privileges needed. User interaction is not needed for exploitation.Product: AndroidVersions: Android kernelAndroid ID: A-152409173

notes.Note: sbeattie> see salsa link for 4.9 stable commits.

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'was needs-triage ESM criteria').
